channel.title: Posts on Zac's Summer Movie Night
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Zac's Summer Movie Night

item.title: Upcoming Movie Nights
item.description: Season Over

item.title: Summer 2025 End
item.description: Previous Nights 2025

item.title: Saturday, October 11th (7:30PM)
item.description: Re-Animator 1985 | 84 mins | Rating: Unrated Director: Stuart Gordon IMDB After an odd new medical student arrives on campus, a dedicated local and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue. Zombie Nightmare 1987 | 89 mins | Rating: R Director: Jack Bravman, John Fasano BOTW IMDB A mother resorts to voodoo to get back at those who killed her son.

item.title: Saturday, September 27th (7:30PM)
item.description: Chopping Mall 1986 | 77 mins | Rating: R Director: Jim Wynorski BOTW IMDB A group of young shopping mall employees stay behind for a late night party in one of the stores. When the mall goes on lock-down before they can get out, the robot security system malfunctions, and goes on a killing spree. Devil Story 1986 | 76 mins | Rating: Unrated Director: Bernard Launois BOTW IMDB A deformed man living with his mother in the countryside roams the woods killing indiscriminately.

item.title: Saturday, September 13th (7:30PM)
item.description: Danger: Diabolik 1968 | 105 mins | Rating: PG-13 Director: Mario Bava IMDB A master thief and his sensual lover pull off heist after heist, all while an envious coalition of cops and gangsters is gunning for them. Hard Ticket to Hawaii 1987 | 96 mins | Rating: R Director: Andy Sidaris BOTW IMDB In Hawaii, an undercover DEA agent and her civilian friend stumble upon a drug trafficking operation, and have to enlist the help of all their colleagues/friends to go after the vicious drug kingpin.

item.title: Saturday, August 30th (7:30PM)
item.description: Ski School 1991 | 95 mins | Rating: R Director: Damian Lee IMDB Rival groups in a skiing school do battle on and off the piste. One gang are rich and serious, the other group are party animals. Rad 1986 | 93 mins | Rating: PG Director: Hal Needham IMDB The story of one young man, Cru Jones, who has the intensity and desire to win a BMX race called Helltrack.

item.title: Saturday, August 16th (7:30PM)
item.description: For Your Height Only 1981 | 88 mins | Rating: Unrated Director: Eddit Nicart IMDB The diminutive Agent 00 must rescue a kidnapped scientist and stop a mysterious warlord from taking over the world. Kiss the Girls and Make Them Die 1966 | 106 mins | Rating: Unrated Director: Henry Levin, Dino Mairui IMDB In this spoof of spy films, CIA agent, Kelly, is in Rio De Janeiro spying on a wealthy industrialist, David Ardonian, who secretly plans to turn the world sterile and repopulate it with his harem.

item.title: Saturday, July 26th (7:30PM)
item.description: Sworn to Justice 1996 | 97 mins | Rating: R Director: Paul Maslak IMDB After attackers kill her sister and nephew, a female psychologist becomes a defense witness by day and an avenger by night. Women on the Run 1993 | 89 mins | Rating: Unrated Director: David Lai, Corey Yuen IMDB A young woman named Yin dreams of leaving her modest village life for a chance to try to make it big as a martial arts movie star.

item.title: Saturday, July 12th (7:30PM)
item.description: Brain Damage 1988 | 84 mins | Rating: R Director: Frank Henenlotter IMDB One morning, a young man wakes to find that a small, disgusting creature has attached itself to the base of his brain stem. The creature gives him a euphoric state of happiness but demands human victims in return. Bloody Muscle Body Builder In Hell 1995 | 62 mins | Rating: Unrated Director: Shinichi Fukazawa IMDB Trapped inside a haunted house, a body builder must save himself from a gruesome ghost hell-bent on revenge.

item.title: Saturday, June 28th (7:30PM)
item.description: GETEVEN 1993 | 90 mins | Rating: Unrated Director: John De Hart, James Paradise BOTW IMDB Two cops are fired after being setup by their corrupt boss, who gets appointed as judge, but secretly heads a satanic cult. After his wife is killed by the cult, one of the cops is determined to bring the cult down. The Instructor 1981 | 94 mins | Rating: R Director: Bob Bendell BOTW IMDB Bendell's self-defense school is considered pretty good, but not in the league of the one run by his rival.

item.title: Summer 2024 End
item.description: Previous Nights 2024

item.title: Saturday, October 12th (7:30PM)
item.description: Alien Private Eye 1989 | 95 mins Director: Vik Rubenfeld BOTW Aliens have long integrated themselves among the human population to the point that they are physically indistinguishable, except for their uniquely pointed ears; a physical trait they go to great lengths to hide or have surgically altered in order to fully blend into human society. Lemro, an alien, has found his calling on earth working as a private investigator.

item.title: Saturday, September 21st (7:30PM)
item.description: Hollow Gate 1988 | 76 mins Director: Ray Di Zazzo BOTW At a Halloween party, a young boy is almost killed by his drunken, alcoholic father. Ten years afterward, the boy goes on a murder spree. Don't Panic 1987 | 90 mins Director: Rub√©n Galindo Jr. BOTW On his seventeenth birthday, Michael wears little kid dinosaur pajamas and unwittingly unlocks the evil forces of a Ouija board.

item.title: Saturday, September 7th (7:30PM)
item.description: For Your Height Only 1981 | 88 mins Director: Eddit Nicart The diminutive Agent 00 must rescue a kidnapped scientist and stop a mysterious warlord from taking over the world. She 1984 | 106 mins Director: Avi Nesher In a post-apocalyptic America, She, a fierce warrior who leads a women's cult, teams up with two brothers searching for their kidnapped sister. They come across weird cults before standing against the odds to defeat the evil Norks.

item.title: Saturday, August 24th (7:30PM)
item.description: China O'Brien 1990 | 86 mins Director: Robert Clouse A police woman, expert and instructor in martial arts, leaves the city to stay with her dad, sheriff in a town with peace and quiet - or so she thinks. She gets plenty opportunities to show her martial arts skills. China O'Brien 2 1990 | 92 mins Director: Robert Clouse This time China O'Brien has trouble with a dealer who puts a prize on her head because she had spoiled an important drug deal of his.

item.title: Saturday, August 10th (7:30PM)
item.description: Heroin Busters 1977 | 94 mins Director: Enzo G. Castellari An Italian policeman goes undercover to break up an international heroin smuggling ring, and butts heads with a hot-tempered Interpol agent assigned to the same task. Kiss the Girls and Make Them Die 1966 | 106 mins Director: Henry Levin, Dino Mairui In this spoof of spy films, CIA agent, Kelly, is in Rio De Janeiro spying on a wealthy industrialist, David Ardonian, who secretly plans to turn the world sterile and repopulate it with his harem.

item.title: Saturday, July 27th (7:30PM)
item.description: Velocipastor 2017 | 75 mins Director: Brendan Steere After losing his parents, a priest travels to China, where he inherits a mysterious ability that allows him to turn into a dinosaur. At first horrified by this new power, a hooker convinces him to use it to fight crime. And ninjas. Action USA 1989 | 97 mins Director: John Stewart BOTW After her boyfriend is murdered by the gangsters whose diamonds he stole, a girl is protected by two FBI agents who plan to keep her from sharing the same fate.

item.title: Saturday, July 13th (7:30PM)
item.description: Magic Crystal 1986 | 95 mins Director: Jing Wong The Russians and the Hong Kong authorities are after a mysterious rock discovered in Athens, Greece, which holds strange powers. Righting Wrongs 1986 | 92 mins Director: Corey Yuen Martial Arts legend Yuen Biao stars as Ha Ling-Ching, a respected prosecutor who has always followed the rule of law, but has recently found himself frustrated by the ineffectiveness of the court system.

item.title: Saturday, June 22nd (7:30PM)
item.description: Basket Case 1982 | 91 mins Director: Frank Henenlotter A young man carrying a big basket that contains his extremely deformed, formerly conjoined twin brother seeks vengeance on the doctors who separated them against their will. Frankenhooker 1990 | 85 mins Director: Frank Henenlotter A medical student sets out to recreate his decapitated fianc√©e by building her a new body made of Manhattan street prostitutes.

item.title: Summer 2023 End
item.description: Previous Nights 2023

item.title: Saturday, September 30th (7:30PM)
item.description: Frankenhooker 1990 | 85 mins Director: Frank Henenlotter A medical student sets out to recreate his decapitated fianc√©e by building her a new body made of Manhattan street prostitutes. Spookies 1986 | 85 mins Director: Genie Joseph, Thomas Doran, Brendan Faulkner BOTW A wicked sorcerer tries to sacrifice a group of people inside his house with the intention of using their vitality to keep his wife alive.

item.title: Saturday, September 2nd (7:30PM)
item.description: New York Ninja 2021 | 93 mins Director: John Liu, Kurtis Spieler BOTW Originally shot in 1984 and not finished until 2021, New York Ninja is about a sound technician for a news station (John Liu) who becomes a vigilante ninja in New York City after his pregnant wife is murdered. American Rickshaw 1989 | 93 mins Director: Sergio Martino BOTW In a movie with way, way too much plot, a Miami manual rickshaw driver finds himself entangled in the murder of a man he just met.

item.title: Saturday, August 19th (7:30PM)
item.description: Alien Private Eye 1989 | 95 mins Director: Vik Rubenfeld BOTW Aliens have long integrated themselves among the human population to the point that they are physically indistinguishable, except for their uniquely pointed ears; a physical trait they go to great lengths to hide or have surgically altered in order to fully blend into human society. Lemro, an alien, has found his calling on earth working as a private investigator.

item.title: Saturday, July 29th (7:30PM)
item.description: Undefeatable 1993 | 92 mins Director: Godfrey Ho Kristi Jones avenges her sister's death at the hands of a crazed martial arts rapist with alarming mommy issues. Raw Force 1981 | 86 mins Director: Edward D. Murphy A group of martial-arts students is heading to an island that supposedly is home to the ghosts of martial artists who have lost their honor. A Hitler lookalike and his gang are running a female-slavery operation on the island as well.

item.title: Saturday, July 15th (7:30PM)
item.description: Primal Rage 1988 | 91 mins Director: Patrick Magee A scientist at a Florida university inadvertently creates a "rage virus" while performing experiments intended to restore dead brain tissue in baboons. When a journalist for the college paper breaks into the campus lab, he's bitten by one of the infected baboons; the virus soon spreads to a trio of rapists and a valley girl, all of whom go on killing sprees.

item.title: Saturday, July 1st (7:30PM)
item.description: Velocipastor 2017 | 75 mins Director: Brendan Steere After losing his parents, a priest travels to China, where he inherits a mysterious ability that allows him to turn into a dinosaur. At first horrified by this new power, a hooker convinces him to use it to fight crime. And ninjas. Attack of the Beast Creatures 1985 | 82 mins Director: Michael Stanley A group of shipwreck victims find themselves stranded on an uncharted island where they encounter demonic alien Cabbage Patch dolls made up to look like Marilyn Manson.

item.title: Saturday, June 17th (7:30PM)
item.description: Righting Wrongs 1986 | 92 mins Director: Corey Yuen Martial Arts legend Yuen Biao stars as Ha Ling-Ching, a respected prosecutor who has always followed the rule of law, but has recently found himself frustrated by the ineffectiveness of the court system. Ha is pushed over the edge by the murder of a key witness in a trial along with the witness's entire family. Fed up with the court's inability to punish the guilty and protect the innocent, Ha decides to take the law into his own hands and eliminate those responsible for the murders.

item.title: Summer 2022 End
item.description: Previous Nights 2022

item.title: Saturday, October 15th (7:30PM)
item.description: Slaughter Day 1991 | 58 mins Director: Brent Cousins In the rural recesses of Hawaii, a pair of friends must fight an ancient evil force brought to life by an occult book that possesses a group of construction workers, turning them into murderous maniacs. Night of the Creeps 1986 | 88 mins Director: Fred Dekker In 1959, an alien experiment crashes to earth and infects a fraternity member. They freeze the body, but in the modern day, two geeks pledging a fraternity accidentally thaw the corpse, which proceeds to infect the campus with parasites that transform their hosts into killer zombies.

item.title: Saturday, October 1st (7:30PM)
item.description: Slaughter High 1986 | 90 mins Director: George Dugdale, Mark Ezra, Peter Litten BOTW Eight people with unintelligible accents are invited to their old high school for their ten-year reunion where a fellow former student, disfigured from a prank gone wrong, is out to seek revenge. Horror High 1973 | 85 mins Director: Larry N. Stouffer A shock-filled tale of a serious and shy but brilliant science student who, when wrongfully forced to consume a new drug he'd created, becomes a modern day Jekyll and Hyde.

item.title: Saturday, September 17th (7:30PM)
item.description: Uninvited 1987 | 91 mins Director: Greydon Clark BOTW A cat infected with a genetically engineered virus escapes from a lab and goes on a killing spree, finding its way onboard a shady businessman's yacht loaded with young guests. Carnosaur 2 1995 | 83 mins Director: Louis Morneau BOTW A team of scientists go to a nuclear mining facility to investigate a possible meltdown and instead find a large amount of cloned dinosaurs.

item.title: Saturday, September 3rd (7:30PM)
item.description: Black Roses 1988 | 90 mins Director: John Fasano BOTW Demons hypnotize the general public by posing as a rock and roll band. Rock and Roll Nightmare 1987 | 83 mins Director: John Fasano BOTW At a farmhouse in the middle of nowhere, a hopeful hair-metal band seeking inspiration to record their upcoming new LP will soon find themselves in a furious confrontation against the Prince of Darkness himself.

item.title: Saturday, August 20th (7:30PM)
item.description: Righting Wrongs 1986 | 92 mins Director: Corey Yuen Martial Arts legend Yuen Biao stars as Ha Ling-Ching, a respected prosecutor who has always followed the rule of law, but has recently found himself frustrated by the ineffectiveness of the court system. Ha is pushed over the edge by the murder of a key witness in a trial along with the witness's entire family. Fed up with the court's inability to punish the guilty and protect the innocent, Ha decides to take the law into his own hands and eliminate those responsible for the murders.

item.title: Saturday, July 23rd (7:30PM)
item.description: Alien Private Eye 1989 | 95 mins Director: Vik Rubenfeld BOTW Aliens have long integrated themselves among the human population to the point that they are physically indistinguishable, except for their uniquely pointed ears; a physical trait they go to great lengths to hide or have surgically altered in order to fully blend into human society. Lemro, an alien, has found his calling on earth working as a private investigator.

item.title: Saturday, July 9th (7:30PM)
item.description: The Human Tornado 1976 | 96 mins Director: Rudy Ray Moore Dolemite flees to California, where he helps Queen Bee and her Kung Fu prostitutes battle a local gangster. Trailer NSFW Petey Wheatstraw 1977 | 94 mins Director: Rudy Ray Moore BOTW After being murdered by his rivals, Petey Wheatstraw is resurrected in exchange for marrying the devil's daughter, the world's ugliest woman. Trailer NSFW

item.title: Saturday, June 25th (7:30PM)
item.description: Sleepaway Camp 1983 | 84 mins Director: Robert Hiltzik After a horrible boating accident kills her family, shy, sullen Angela moves in with her eccentric Aunt Martha and protective cousin Ricky. One summer, Martha sends the kids to Camp Arawak. Soon after their arrival, bizarre, increasingly violent accidents claim the lives of various campers. Who is the twisted individual behind these murders? Madman 1981 | 88 mins Director: Joe Giannone Years ago, Madman Marz violently murdered his family only to escape into the woods before his execution could be completed.

item.title: Saturday, June 11th (7:30PM)
item.description: Hands of Steel 1986 | 94 mins Director: Sergio Martino A cyborg is programmed to kill a scientist who holds the fate of mankind in his hands. He fails and hides in a diner in a desert run by a woman who likes him. The people who sent him are after him and so is the local arm wrestling champ. Directed by Sergio Martino, director of such classics as 'American Rickshaw' American Rickshaw 1989 | 93 mins Director: Sergio Martino BOTW In a movie with way, way too much plot, a Miami manual rickshaw driver finds himself entangled in the murder of a man he just met.

item.title: Saturday, June 4th (7:30PM)
item.description: Stone Cold 1991 | 92 mins Director: Craig R. Baxley BOTW A tough Alabama cop is blackmailed by the FBI into going undercover in a violent Mississippi biker gang. New York Ninja 2021 | 93 mins Director: John Liu, Kurtis Spieler BOTW Originally shot in 1984 and not finished until 2021, New York Ninja is about a sound technician for a news station (John Liu) who becomes a vigilante ninja in New York City after his pregnant wife is murdered.
